metadata.name: Anime #1: Fading Memories of Decadent Love
metadata.description:
1/1 minted on DIVERGENT ANIME by Athena Novo, 2022

Anime #1: Fading Memories of Decadent Love is the Genesis Piece of the DIVERGENT ANIME smart contract. The title is the description here.. On to other topics then..

...

The pieces are part of my fascination with anime that is growing darker as time passes. I had started Divergent Anime mints on Async Art with a Blueprints project which is a project I'm proud of. After that my level of experimentalism grew with further mints on AA and KO. 

Finally Divergent Anime has reached its darkest stage where the anime, cartoon, film, noir and photography get together in experimental AI assisted world creation. My wish for this project and its smart contract to go on for a long time. Its pace will depend on me and you as a collector. Its content is free to change and evolve as times change and I change alongside. 

I will also mint some pieces on my favorite platforms so that more people will know about the project.

Let's go!
